lead_paragraph: Candace Parker scored 34 points, the most ever in a W.N.B.A. debut, and added 12 rebounds Saturday to help the visiting Los Angeles Sparks to a 99-94 victory over the Phoenix Mercury, the league’s defending champion.
snippet: Candace Parker scored 34 points, the most ever in a W.N.B.A. debut, and added 12 rebounds Saturday to help the visiting Los Angeles Sparks to a 99-94 victory over the Phoenix Mercury, the league’s defending champion.
